tei:elementSpec.tei:desc: A dynamics definition associates a literal dynamics instruction with a numeric loudness value.

tei:remarks.tei:p: If the loudness values should be MIDI compliant the maximum loudness is 127.0. This should be kept in mind if the performance should be rendered to an expressive MIDI/audio output. Apart from this, however, the user is free to associate any other unit of measure.
